sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-registration', templateUrl: './registration.component.html', styleUrls: ['./registration.component.scss'] }) export class RegistrationComponent implements OnInit { form!: FormGroup; constructor(public fb: FormBuilder) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.validation() } private validation(): void{ this.form = this.fb.group({ primeiroNome: ['', Validators.required], ultimoNome: ['', Validators.required], email: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.email]], userName: ['', Validators.required], senha: ['', [Validators.required,Validators.minLength(6)]], confimeSenha: ['', Validators.required], }) } }
